jcr:content.jcr:title: International Conference of Marxist–Leninist Parties and Organizations

contentheadline.headline: International Conference of Marxist–Leninist Parties and Organizations

contentrichtext.text: The '''International Conference of Marxist–Leninist Parties and Organizations''' (ICMLPO) is a name used by two unrelated networks of communist groups: * [[International Conference of Marxist–Leninist Parties and Organizations (International Newsletter)]]: A grouping of parties and organizations adhering to [[Maoism|Marxism-Leninism-Mao Zedong Thought]]. Main organizer is the [[Marxist-Leninist Party of Germany|MLPD]]. * [[International Conference of Marxist–Leninist Parties and Organizations (Unity & Struggle)]]: A grouping of parties and organizations that uphold the line of [[Enver Hoxha]] and the [[Albanian Party of Labour]]. {{disambiguation}}
